text: Your career manager pings: 'Your LinkedIn is tragic. No photos, no keywords. Fix it or remain invisible.'
title: Digital Presence Check

text: You submit your resume to 50 portals. Automated reply: 'Unable to parse skills.' It's an ATS format issue.
title: The ATS Wall

text: Should you copy-paste the same 'Hi, surely hiring?' message to 100 CTOs?
title: Outreach Strategy

text: A friend offers a quick Upwork gig. $50 for a React fix. It distracts from job hunting.
title: Side Hustle Distraction

choices.text: Take It But Add to Portfolio

text: Mom calls: 'Why aren't you employed yet? My friend's son just joined Google.'
title: Domestic Pressure

text: Email: 'Urgent Hiring! $200k/yr Data Entry. Click here to attach bank details.'
title: Suspicious Email

text: Your portfolio site is down. AWS bill unpaid or config error.
title: 404 Portfolio Not Found

text: A junior recruiter calls. 'Tell me about yourself.' You haven't practiced this.
title: Surprise Screening

choices.text: Use STAR Framework on the Fly
Be Honest: 'Can I Gather My Thoughts?'

text: Live SQL Query Challenge. 'Select top 3 customers by revenue.'
title: SQL Screening

text: Python Algorithmic Task. 'Invert a Binary Tree.' Classic.
title: Algo Screening

text: Explain the difference between L1 and L2 regularization.
title: ML Concept Check

text: You felt good about the screening, but it's been 2 weeks. Silence.
title: The Ghost

text: Company X sends a 'Take Home Test'. Build a full React App in 48 hours for free.
title: Unpaid Labor?

text: A former colleague works at a target company. Ask for a referral?
title: Network Tap

text: Recruiter asks: 'What is your current salary?' Trap question.
title: Salary Check

text: Application form asks: 'Do you requires sponsorship now or in the future?'
title: The Visa Box

text: Onsite Round 1: 'Design Twitter.' Whiteboard session.
title: System Design

text: Onsite Round 1: 'Revenue dropped 20%. Diagnose why.'
title: Business Case

text: Interview Question: 'Tell me about a time you failed.'
title: Behavioral Check

text: Interviewer opens IDE. 'Let's code this together.' He watches every keystroke.
title: Pair Programming

text: Interviewer acts rude and dismissive. 'Is that really your answer?'
title: Stress Test

text: Final Check: The 'Bar Raiser' from another team joins to check culture fit.
title: The Bar Raiser

choices.text: Ask About Their Perspective on Role

text: Team invites you to lunch. 'Casual chat.' It is NOT casual.
title: The Lunch Test

text: Offer received! Base salary is 10% lower than market average.
title: Low Offer

text: Offer includes '10,000 ISOs'. You have no idea what the strike price is.
title: Equity Math

text: 'We need an answer in 24 hours.' The Exploding Offer.
title: Deadline Pressure

text: They want to talk to your previous manager. The one you hated.
title: Reference Check

text: Another company calls with interest just as you're closing.
title: Leverage

choices.text: Mention Company B to Company A

text: Final Contract is on the table. It's safe but boring.
title: The Decision

text: A stealth startup offers equity only but huge potential.
title: High Risk Bet
